location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a copy of a letter from Abdella ben Soud [Abdullah bin Saud] to William Bruce and a letter from Abdella ben Soud to Rehma ben Jauber [Rahma bin Jaber], discussing their reluctance for Arab tribes to be included under British Protection. The letter also reports on two battles between Joasemee [Qasami] boats and the fleet of the Imam of Muscat. The enclosed letters are translations of the originals.
